name: GIMP Parametric Brush File
summary: Learn about .VBR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Parametric brushes can be created using GIMP's Brush Editor. Several built-in VBR files can be found in the /​share/​gimp/​2.0/​brushes/​ directory of a GIMP installation.

description: Parametric brush used by GIMP, a cross-platform image editing program that runs on the X Windows System; contains a shape that can be painted on a canvas; can be resized for drawing with larger or smaller-scale brushes.
